name: Black Diamond Trailback Trekking Poles - Unisex
description: Keep your balance and be nice to those knees. In a light and durable package, these 3-section poles are ready to hit the ground on day hikes, highline scrambles and coastal hikes. These sturdy sticks keep you stable under a multi-day pack. And on the downhill, they're a great trick for saving your knees from unnecessary strain.3-section design gives you 63-140cm of usable length for any terrain.Aluminum construction is light, durable and economical.Double FlickLocks can be used with gloves and securely close the pole.Rubber grip with EVA grip extension creates a light and comfortable hold.LIned nylon webbing adjusts to your wrist.Carbide tip gives good traction on variable ground.Low profile trekking baskets reduce snag.
